suppress.notes: YAML is not used via jackson-databind, see https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-1471
HTTP is not used, see https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-41033 As per CVE https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-27225, it affects an old versioning system, false negative
